events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund immediately because this was a gift.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request due to the customer's request for money back on a wrong item.
The case has been assigned to agent John Smith for handling the refund procedure.
Hello, I am John from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I am here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund efficiently?
Here is my order number 123456, and I’ve attached the photo of the wrong item. I really need this resolved quickly.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund offer. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the money soon.
Your refund has been processed, and you should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We just wanted to follow up and ensure that you received your refund and that everything is now satisfactory.
Since we have not heard back from you, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
Please take a moment to fill out our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
